===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# a [[year]] of the [[duodecennial]] [[Jovian]] [[orbital]] [[cycle]] or of the {{w|Chinese sexagenary cycle|sexagenary cycle}} [[base]]d upon it, {{lb|zh|particularly}} [[use]]d in [[discussion]] of [[age]].
#: {{zh-x|現在 你 幾 歲？|How old are you now?}}
#: {{zh-x|我 十八 歲。|I am 18 '''years''' old.}}
# {{w|Tai Sui}}, the [[god]] [[represent]]ing [[each]] of [[these]] [[year]]s
# [[age]]
# [[time]]; [[period]]
# [[crop]] [[harvest]]s of the [[year]]

====Usage note====
Ages in {{lang|zh|歲}} are traditionally reckoned using the Chinese lunar calendar, considered as 1 year old at the moment of birth and increasing not during birthdays, but at the [[Chinese New Year]].
